name: Job Init
description: Collaborative job listing aggregator tailored specifically to developer openings -- Full stack MERN app, which also utilizes Adzuna's API, Mongoose, and a number of other NPM packages.

name: Book, Line & Sinker
description: Collaborative application built with NodeJS, Express, Handlebars, Sequelize, HTML, CSS, and Javascript.

name: COVID-19 Info Tracker
description: Collaborative application built with New York Times Scrapper API, the Virus Tracker API, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.

name: Employee Directory
description: Employee Directory created with React with sorting and filtering functionality.

name: Eat-Da-Burger
description: Burger tracker app built with MySQL, Node, Express, Handlebars, and a custom ORM.

name: Fitness Tracker
description: Workout tracker application that uses a Mongo database with a Mongoose schema and handled routes with Express.
